verses.english: By the sun and its brightness
verses.hausa: Ina rantsuwa da rãnã da hantsinta.

verses.english: And [by] the moon when it follows it
verses.hausa: Kuma da wata idan ya bi ta.

verses.english: And [by] the day when it displays it
verses.hausa: Da yini a lõkacin da ya bayyana ta.

verses.english: And [by] the night when it covers it
verses.hausa: Da dare a lõkacin da ya ke rufe ta.

verses.english: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
verses.hausa: Da sama da abin da ya gina ta.

verses.english: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
verses.hausa: Da ƙasã da abin da ya shimfiɗa ta.

verses.english: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
verses.hausa: Da rai da abin da ya daidaita shi.

verses.english: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan ya sanar da shi fãjircinsa da shiryuwarsa.

verses.english: He has succeeded who purifies it,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne wanda ya tsarkake shi (rai) ya sãmi babban rabo.

verses.english: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne wanda ya turbuɗe shi (da laifi) ya tãɓe.

verses.english: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
verses.hausa: Samũdãwa sun ƙaryata (Annabinsu), dõmin girman kansu.

verses.english: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da mafi shaƙãwarsu ya tafi (wurin sõke rãkumar sãlihu).

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
verses.english: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
verses.hausa: Sai Manzon Allah ya gaya musu cewa: "Ina tsõratar da ku ga rãƙumar Allah da ruwan shanta!"

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.english: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
verses.hausa: Sai suka ƙaryata shi, sa'an nan suka sõke ta. Sabõda haka Ubangijinsu Ya darkãke su, sabõda zunubinsu. Sa'an nan Ya daidaita ta (azãbar ga mai laifi da maras laifi).

verses.english: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã ya tsõron ãƙibarta (ita halakãwar).
